com.github.marcoshsc.orsApiTools.directions.helperclasses

Class RequestOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.marcoshsc.orsApiTools.directions.helperclasses.RequestOptions

  • public class RequestOptions
extends java.lang.Object
    Describe useful information about the request that generated the response. Note that some fields can be null and it must be checked before it's use.
    Author:
    Marcos Henrique
